Texts.Chs: 现在让我们更进一步。建造一个^orange;大型蜂箱^reset;来挖掘蜂园的潜力。你应该多抓一点^green;黄蜂或者兰草蜜蜂^reset;用来生产建造所需的^orange;金色木材^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Now we can get a bit more adventurous. Create a ^orange;Large Apiary^reset; to double your bee farm potential. You'll need some ^orange;Golden Wood^reset; to build it. Try ^cyan;Bumblebees or Orchid bees^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 大型蜂箱能够支持^green;两个巢框^reset;，两倍的工蜂意味着两倍的产量，收益是相当可观的！
Texts.Eng: These sweet babies can hold ^green;two frames^reset;, and twice as many drones means twice as much production, too. The gains are quite substantial!
